response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity that I believe aligns perfectly with your needs and aspirations. The product I am offering is not just any item; it holds immense value and potential for growth, which I estimate to be well above its market price of $1,000,000. Given its unique features and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am confident it would be an invaluable asset to you.

To make this offer even more compelling, I am proposing to sell it to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its estimated value and presents a fantastic opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a highly competitive rate.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am here to answer any questions you might have and to ensure that this transaction meets all your expectations.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
